TutorialScript.TutorialStep: At last, Prom Night is finally here! Despite everything, Monica still has butterflies in her stomach.
Maybe she *does* want to be prom queen after all. I mean, it's what she was born to be, isn't it?
Maybe everything she's been doing this week has been a mistake! Maybe... maybe...
Deep breath, deep breath. I mean, look at Cassandra's outfit. Monica is clearly still the best-dressed person here.
Whatever happens, this is going to be a prom to remember. Although not because of that oldies band playing 2000s music. They suck.
